snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.body: Drop in a beautifully designed FAQ that surfaces the right answer at the moment of doubt. Customers get unblocked instantly, objections dissolve before they turn into tickets, and you close more sales without adding more support. Customize once, embed anywhere, and let it work 24/7.
snapshot.blocks.big-bang.copy.headline: Watch questions answer themselves in real-time
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.headline: Connect with every customer, everywhere
snapshot.blocks.cta.copy.subheadline: AI-powered FAQ that speaks their language and understands their needs.
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.headline: FAQs Widget. Beautiful answers. Built to be fast.
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.subheadline: Polished design, effortless updates, and SEO foundations--ready for any language, powered by AI.
snapshot.blocks.minibob.copy.heading: Make it yours
snapshot.blocks.minibob.copy.subhead: Design your perfect FAQ right here. See changes instantly.

snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.0.body: Every question left unanswered is a customer walking away. Visitors leave when they can't find what they need. A well-designed FAQ kills objections before they even form—so customers convince themselves to buy without ever reaching out.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.0.title: Stop losing sales to unanswered questions
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.1.body: Cut support volume by 40%+ when customers find answers instantly. No more Slack pings. No more "quick question" emails. No more context-switching hell. Your FAQ does the heavy lifting while you focus on work that actually matters.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.1.title: Get your time back
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.2.body: The right FAQ anticipates doubt and removes friction at 2 AM when you're offline. Your answers work around the clock. Customers don't wait for you—they get unblocked, trust what they see, and hit "buy" without interrupting your day.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.items.2.title: Close more deals while you sleep
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.subhead: Your customers have questions. Answer them once, not a hundred times.
snapshot.blocks.steps.copy.title: FAQs that actually work (so you don't have to)
